column5: My place is close to parks, eats and drinks. Walking distance to Lockwood park,The Pearl, Dignowity meats, Panchos and Gringos, Tucker's Kozy Korner, Alamo Brewery and Burleson Yard Beergarden.  5-10 minute bike-ride to the Alamo, Hemisfair park, Historic Market square, Southtown and more.. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location, the outdoor space, and privacy of a small bungalow in walking distance of the city. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travel.
